author: Ilya Shapiro
title: You Can’t Talk Politics Here, This Is a Polling Place
text:
Minnesotans may be nice, but their state government is awfully imperious when it comes to politics. Since 1912, the state has banned any “political badge, political button, or other political insignia” in or around polling places on Election Day. That’s a problem, because the First Amendment extends far beyond verbal expression.
